channel.title: Having some problems with custom client
channel.description: Hello everyone, I'm having some troubles with my servers client.. whenever people try to connect with my custom client, they can't connect. But, when they try to login with Silab's client, they can. I've check my client files for my custom client and the ip is correct. Anyone know what's wrong?

item.title: Having some problems with custom client
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Owns1 Mopar Owns
item.description:
@Mopar_Owns1 wrote:

Rathynia:

have you tryed port fowarding and also trying to make a no-ip??..

I have port-forwarded, and i have a no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Having some problems with custom client

item.title: Having some problems with custom client
item.dc:creator: @Rathynia Rathynia
item.description:
@Rathynia wrote:

watismijnip.nl[ftp][/ftp]

try that and find out your ip address then try it and see if your ip address works…

Read full topic
item.source: Having some problems with custom client

item.title: Having some problems with custom client
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

See if the client actually loads from your IP.

It could be that it is loading to a local IP (127.0.0.1) or to some other server that is offline.

Read full topic
item.source: Having some problems with custom client

item.description:
@Mopar_Owns1 wrote:

Hello everyone,
I’m having some troubles with my servers client… whenever people try to connect with my custom client, they can’t connect. But, when they try to login with Silab’s client, they can. I’ve check my client files for my custom client and the ip is correct. Anyone know what’s wrong?
